thread.title: VIDEO: Spotlight on Turner Prize nominees
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Spotlight on Turner Prize nominees

title: VIDEO: Spotlight on Turner Prize nominees
text:
Spotlight on Turner Prize nominees 30   18:45 BST 
An exhibition opens on Thursday featuring the four artists nominated for the UK's most prestigious arts award: the Turner Prize. 
For the first time it is being presented in Scotland. The winner will be announced in December. 
One of the short-listed artists is Assemble: a collective who work in art, architecture and design. 
Our arts editor, Will Gompertz, met two of the group's 14 members at the Tramway in Glasgow.
